mapper.select: SELECT l.LESSON_NO, l.LESSON_TITLE, l.LESSON_ROOM, l.LESSON_SCHEDULE, l.LESSON_START_DATE, l.LESSON_END_DATE, l.LESSON_CAPACITY, l.LESSON_TUITION_FEE, l.LESSON_MATERIAL_FEE, l.LESSON_TARGET_AUDIENCE, l.LESSON_TITLE , l.CLOSE_YN, w.MEMBER_NO AS WISH_MEMBER_NO, e.MEMBER_NO AS ENROLL_MEMBER_NO, l.LESSON_REGISTER_START, l.LESSON_REGISTER_END, l.LESSON_REMAINS, l.IMG_PATH, l.LESSON_DETAIL, l.DELETE_YN, CASE WHEN w.MEMBER_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS WISH_YN, CASE WHEN e.MEMBER_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ENROLL_YN FROM LESSONS l LEFT JOIN LESSONS_WISHLIST w ON l.LESSON_NO = w.LESSON_NO AND w.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} LEFT JOIN STUDENT_ENROLLMENTS e ON l.LESSON_NO = e.LESSON_NO AND e.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} WHERE w.MEMBER_NO IS NOT NULL OR e.MEMBER_NO IS NOT NULL
